NeedDef.label: mood
NeedDef.description: Mood represents how happy or stressed someone is. If mood gets too low, the person may suffer a mental break. There are several categories of mental breaks, of differing severities.

NeedDef.label: food
NeedDef.description: Food is the amount of nutrition a creature has consumed recently. If it is at zero, a creature will become increasingly malnourished and eventually die.

NeedDef.label: rest
NeedDef.description: Rest is how much sleep a creature has gotten recently.

NeedDef.label: joy
NeedDef.description: Joy represents the need to do something pleasurable from time to time. Note that repeating the same kind of activity makes it less effective in gaining joy.

NeedDef.label: beauty
NeedDef.description: Beauty reflects how visually pleasing a person has found their surroundings recently.

NeedDef.label: comfort
NeedDef.description: Comfort is gained by sitting in or sleeping on comfortable furniture.

NeedDef.label: space
NeedDef.description: Space reflects a sense of being physically free and able to move around. It is harmed by spending extended periods in cramped rooms.
